title: Java Intern
description:
About Hema AI
 
 Hema AI is an AI\\-focused technology company building intelligent, scalable software products. We leverage modern engineering practices and robust backend systems to support high\\-performance, AI\\-driven applications.
 



  




 Role Overview
 
 We are seeking a Java Intern to assist in the development, testing, and maintenance of backend systems and services. The intern will work with experienced engineers to build reliable, scalable, and secure Java\\-based applications.
 



  




 Key Responsibilities
 * Develop and maintain backend services using Java
* Assist in designing and implementing RESTful APIs
* Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices
* Participate in debugging, testing, and performance optimization
* Work with databases and backend integrations
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional engineering teams
* Contribute to code reviews and technical documentation



  




 Required Qualifications
 * Strong fundamentals in Java and object\\-oriented programming
* Understanding of data structures and basic algorithms
* Familiarity with backend development concepts
* Basic knowledge of REST APIs and HTTP protocols
* Experience with Git or other version control tools



  




 Preferred Qualifications
 * Exposure to Spring Boot or similar Java frameworks
* Basic knowledge of SQL and relational databases
* Understanding of microservices architecture
* Academic projects, internships, or hands\\-on backend development experience



  




 What We Offer
 * Paid internship with real\\-world backend engineering exposure
* Fully remote work environment
* Mentorship from experienced backend and platform engineers
* Opportunity to work on production\\-grade systems
* Potential for full\\-time employment based on performance



  




 Application Process
 
 Interested candidates may apply by sending their resume and relevant project details or GitHub profile to:
 **info@tryhema.com**

 .

 testing.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we‚Äôll give you what you need to make it happen. It won‚Äôt always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you‚Äôll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 R\\&D Team Lead
   

  

  

  

  

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 In this role, you will have the opportunity to contribute significantly to successful project results in technology, software, product, and/or solution development, as well as associated Intellectual Proper\\-ty (IP). Each day, you will act as the first point of contact in Research and Development for specific product\\-related issues and maintenance. You will also showcase your expertise by identifying, proposing, and implementing innovative solutions.
   

  

 In this role, you‚Äôll help run what runs the world, by taking on meaningful work that drives real impact.
   

  

 The work model for the role is:
   

  

 This role is contributing to the Electrification business in Smart Power at Bangalore, India.
   

  

**You will be mainly accountable for**
* Required active participation/contribution in team discussions.
* Provide technical solutions to in solving business problems.
* Collaborate with the team to understand business needs and requirements.
* Write clean and efficient code to ensure the quality and performance of the software.
* Perform unit testing and debugging of applications. Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers.


**Our Team Dynamics**
 Our teams support each other, collaborate, and never stop learning. Everyone brings something unique, and together we push ideas forward to solve real problems. Being part of our team means your work matters \\- because the progress we make here creates real impact out there.
   

  

  

**Qualifications For The Role**
* You are immersed in R\\&D function for software development
* You have 7 to 12 years of experience in design, build and configure applications to meet business pro\\-cess and application requirements using Angular, Spring Boot, RESTful API development, Micro services and SQL
* Possess an enhanced knowledge of Angular, Spring Boot
* Degree in Computer Science (should be full\\-time)
* You are at ease communicating in English


**More About Us**
 ABB Smart Power is a global technology leader, with products and solutions that make power supplies smart, connected and protected. Its intelligent products and solutions make power more competitive by improving the energy efficiency, productivity and reliability of almost any operation.
   

  

 \\#ABBCareers \\#RunwithABB \\#Runwhatrunstheworld
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Jr - Data Analyst
description:
Job description
 




 Role Overview
 



 A Prompt Engineer is responsible for designing, testing, optimizing, and maintaining high\\-quality prompts that enable Large Language Models (LLMs) and generative AI systems to deliver accurate, context\\-aware, and business\\-relevant outputs. This role acts as a bridge between business requirements and AI model behavior.
 



 Key Responsibilities
 


* Design structured, reusable, and scalable prompts for text, code, image, and data generation tasks
* Convert business requirements into effective prompt logic and workflows
* Optimize prompts to improve accuracy, consistency, safety, and efficiency
* Conduct A/B testing of prompts and analyze model responses
* Reduce hallucinations, bias, and irrelevant outputs using prompt tuning techniques
* Collaborate with AI Engineers, Product Managers, and Domain Experts
* Document prompt templates, workflows, and best practices
* Train internal teams on prompt usage and AI interaction standards



 Workflow \\& Process
 


* Requirement Analysis: Understand use cases from business or product teams
* Prompt Design: Create base prompts using few\\-shot, chain\\-of\\-thought, or role\\-based techniques
* Testing \\& Iteration: Test outputs across multiple scenarios and refine prompts
* Optimization: Improve token efficiency, response quality, and consistency
* Deployment: Integrate prompts into applications, chatbots, or internal tools
* Monitoring: Continuously evaluate AI responses and update prompts as models evolve



 Required Skills \\& Qualifications
 


* Strong understanding of LLMs (GPT, Claude, Gemini, etc.)
* Excellent English communication and logical thinking
* Knowledge of prompt engineering techniques
* Familiarity with APIs and basic scripting (Python preferred)
* Understanding of AI ethics, bias, and data privacy



 Tools \\& Technologies
 


* OpenAI / Anthropic / Google AI APIs
* Python, JSON, YAML
* AI workflow tools, testing platforms, vector databases (basic understanding)

title: Shopify Developer - Internship
description:
**Company Description**

 Petoty is more than a marketplace; it is a comprehensive ecosystem for pets and their families. From daily necessities to cutting\\-edge health solutions, we provide everything pets need through a trusted platform. Our diverse offerings include e\\-commerce for pet products, a smart health monitoring device, pet insurance, and personalized at\\-home services such as grooming and spa sessions. With innovation and compassion at its core, Petoty is on a mission to make pet parenting seamless and joyful. Our vision is to transform pet care into an experience defined by trust, convenience, and happiness, becoming the ultimate platform for everything pets.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a remote internship role for a Shopify Developer. In this position, you will collaborate with the development team to design, develop, and customize Shopify stores. Your key responsibilities will include coding, testing, and deploying scalable e\\-commerce features, ensuring website performance, and identifying opportunities to enhance user experiences. You will also be responsible for troubleshooting issues and integrating third\\-party applications to boost store functionality.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Shopify platform, Shopify API, and Liquid programming.
* Experience in front\\-end technologies, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related frameworks.
* Basic understanding of e\\-commerce and online store management.
* Problem\\-solving abilities and attention to detail in debugging and optimization.
* Ability to work independently in a remote setup and effectively meet deadlines.
* Prior experience with UI/UX design and third\\-party app integrations is a plus.
* Pursuing a degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Web Development, or related fields is preferred.

title: QA Engineer II - Automation
description:
**This role is for one of the Weekday's clients**
 Min Experience: 4 years
   

  

 Location: Gurgaon
   

  

 JobType: full\\-time
   

  

 As a Quality Assurance Engineer, you will play a critical role in ensuring the reliability, performance, and user experience of a high\\-scale digital platform used by a large and growing customer base. This role blends hands\\-on manual testing with strong automation capabilities and requires close collaboration with engineering, product, and design teams. You will be involved throughout the development lifecycle‚Äîidentifying issues early, validating features rigorously, and continuously improving quality practices. The role is ideal for someone who is detail\\-oriented, quality\\-driven, and passionate about building robust, scalable software products.
   

  

**Requirements**
**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, write, and execute detailed test plans and test cases covering functional, regression, and performance testing
* Perform thorough manual testing to validate features, workflows, and overall user experience
* Develop, maintain, and enhance automated test scripts to improve coverage and efficiency
* Collaborate closely with cross\\-functional teams to identify risks and defects early in the development cycle
* Analyze test results, log defects, and track issues through to resolution using defect management tools
* Strengthen and evolve existing automation frameworks to support scalable and reliable testing
* Participate in improving QA processes, tools, and methodologies in line with industry best practices
* Support release cycles by ensuring quality standards are consistently met across environments
* Mentor and guide junior QA team members, sharing best practices and technical expertise


**What Makes You a Great Fit**
* 4\\-6 years of experience in software quality assurance with exposure to both manual and automation testing
* Strong understanding of QA processes, Agile methodologies, and the software development lifecycle
* Hands\\-on experience with automation tools such as Selenium, Cypress, or equivalent frameworks
* Proficiency in scripting or programming languages like Python or Java for test automation
* Ability to debug, troubleshoot, and analyze issues across frontend and backend systems
* Experience using bug tracking and project management tools, along with version control systems
* Strong analytical mindset with exceptional attention to detail and a commitment to quality
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively across teams
* A proactive approach to improving testing efficiency, reliability, and overall product quality

title: Salesforce QA Engineer - Contract (8 Weeks)
description:
**Role:** 
 Salesforce QA Consultant
 



**Engagement Type:** 
 Contract (2 Months)
 



**Duration:** 
 9th Feb \\- 5th April (Full\\-time)
 



**Work Mode:** 
 Offshore / Remote
 



  





**Company Overview** 



* MetroMax Group is a group of companies specializing in the logistics domain. MetroMax Solutions, part of the MetroMax Group, provides BPO and IT services.
* We have a workforce of 500\\+ team members spread across Atlanta (US), Bangalore, and Jaipur (India).
* Our India centre functions as the Backoffice for US operations while also offering IT and BPO services to global clients.
* The India office achieved a 417% growth in headcount last year, driving significant business expansion.
* MetroMax Group has been operating for 5\\+ years and holds prestigious certifications including ISO 9001, ISO 27001, NASSCOM, TiE, and Great Place to Work.



  





**Role Overview** 




 We are looking for an experienced QA Consultant to support testing activities for Salesforce\\-based applications and integrated systems. The consultant will be responsible for end\\-to\\-end testing, ensuring high\\-quality delivery in an Agile environment.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





 Requirement Analysis
 


1. Analyze business requirements, functional specs, user stories, and design documents
2. Define test scope, approach, and test strategy



  





**Planning \\& Design Test** 



1. Create and maintain detailed test plans, test cases, and test scenarios
2. Prepare test data for Salesforce workflows, integrations, and UI components



  





**Test Execution** 




 Perform Manual Testing including:
 


* Functional Testing
* Regression Testing
* Integration Testing
* API Testing
* Smoke \\& Sanity Testing



  





 Validate Salesforce configurations, workflows, validation rules, and custom components
 



  





**Automation \\& Tools (Good to Have)** 



* Exposure to test automation tools (Selenium, Cypress, or similar)
* API testing using Postman / REST tools



  





**Defect Management** 



* Log, track, and manage defects using Jira / Azure DevOps
* Participate in defect triage and resolution discussions



  





**Collaboration** 



* Work closely with Developers, Business Analysts, and Product Owners
* Actively participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies (daily stand\\-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives)



  





**Documentation \\& Reporting** 



* Maintain test execution reports, defect metrics, and test summary reports
* Communicate testing progress and risks to stakeholders



  





**Required Skills \\& Experience** 



* 3‚Äì6 years of experience in Software Testing / QA
* Strong experience in Salesforce Testing
* Good understanding of Agile/Scrum methodology
* Hands\\-on experience with Manual Testing
* Experience with Jira / Azure DevOps
* Knowledge of API testing and integrations
* Strong communication and coordination skills



  





**Good to Have** 



* Salesforce certifications (Admin / QA related)
* Automation testing exposure
* Experience testing CRM or enterprise applications



  





**Why Join Us** 



* 100% remote work
* Subject to performance and business requirements, the position may be considered for full\\-time employment after the contract term concludes.
* Opportunity to work closely with global clients
* Growth\\-driven environment with continuous learning and development opportunities

title: Senior System Engineer
description:
**Your Team‚Äôs Impact** 




 Candidates for this position should have solid experience with WAN/LAN technologies, TCP/IP, routing protocols and have a deep understanding of reference network architectures along with a significant level of ‚ÄòHands On‚Äô network OS experience. Additionally, candidates with a solid track record of interaction with ISPs, familiarity with automation tools, multicast experience, strong analytical, project management and troubleshooting skills will receive a higher level of consideration.
 



  





 Past success designing or maintaining a network via automation is also expected. Candidates should have competence in at least one scripting language and experience with standard automation tools. A successful candidate for this position will have strong interpersonal skills, an elevated level of verbal and written dexterity and will enjoy providing effective and meaningful solutions for clients, both internal and external.
 



  





**What You‚ÄôII Do** 



* Act as a strong consultative resource for FactSet‚Äôs clients, vendors and internal leaders.
* Engage in major Real Time project delivery and contributing regularly to improve the stability and performance of the Network
* Project manage business and network team initiatives
* Configure Cisco / Arista Routers / Switches / F5 Load Balancers / Cloud Networking Services to provide solutions that successfully integrate into our clients, vendors and FactSet‚Äôs own internal networks
* Build solid \\& long\\-lived interpersonal relationships with FactSet‚Äôs clients and internal stakeholders
* Serve as an escalation point for network down emergencies and layer 1\\-7 network troubleshooting
* Research, design and implement new connections to market data providers and other 3rd parties
* Streamline existing and new processes using templates, automation and workflow systems
* Willing to lead and mentor Junior Network Engineers and help them achieve their career and project goals
* Participate in Shift rotation for Saturday \\& Sunday On\\-call coverage.



  





**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 



* BS degree in an engineering discipline or equivalent
* Relevant experience of 5\\-8 years
* Ability to be self\\-sufficient and to grasp new technologies easily
* Maintain knowledge of present and emerging technologies
* Thorough understanding of following technologies and tools.
* Routing protocols
* TCP/IP
* Multicast (PIM, IGMP, MSDP, GRE, MP\\-BGP)
* DNS
* LAN switching
* Wireshark
* Sound understanding and expertise on Multicast and Real Time
* Experience with BGP, EIGRP routing protocols
* Router / Switch architectures
* Good understanding of Protocols like HTTP / HTTPS / DNS / DHCP / SNMP / SMTP etc
* Broader understanding of Cloud Computing technologies like AWS and Azure.
* Ability to effectively troubleshoot and isolate technical issues in a timely manner
* Excellent oral and written communication skills
* Ability to be a cohesive member of a group
* Ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders and service providers, both internal and external
* Ability to manage many projects simultaneously and prioritize effectively
* Familiarity with common network automation tools
* Python, Perl or other scripting language
* Ansible, Salt or other automation tools
* REST APIs
* YAML, JSON and other data models



  





**Desired Skills** 



* Competence in some of the following technologies:
* LAN Switching
* Optical Networking
* Load Balancers
* SAN
* Wireless Networks
* Network operating systems (IOS, IOS\\-XE, JunOS, EOS, F5/tmsh)
* NSX
* Infoblox
* Linux
* Solid, and intuitive understanding of WAN \\& LAN technologies and how each device, protocol or system interacts as part of the network as a whole
* Understand the modern datacenter stack and how today‚Äôs application compute and storage drive network requirements
* Experience with Exchange data and other contributed data.
* Experience with network packer broker technologies \\- Corvil , Gigamon
* Understanding of Public cloud, Private cloud and Hybrid Network Architectures
* Experience designing networks, not only implementing and supporting
* Competency in programming languages and/or scripting
* Financial industry experience and/or a background in a large enterprise network
* Any experience in building / leading / Mentoring a team is a definite plus
* Competency in programming languages and/or scripting
* Experience with Unix, Linux, and Windows operating systems
* Multiple Cisco / Other Vendor Professional Certifications
* CCIE / Equivalent certification in any stream is a definite plus
* 



**What's In It For You** 




 At FactSet, our people are our greatest asset, and our culture is our biggest competitive advantage. Being a FactSetter means:
 


* The opportunity to join an S\\&P 500 company with over 45 years of sustainable growth powered by the entrepreneurial spirit of a start\\-up.
* Support for your total well\\-being. This includes health, life, and disability insurance, as well as retirement savings plans and a discounted employee stock purchase program, plus paid time off for holidays, family leave, and company\\-wide wellness days.
* Flexible work accommodations. We value work/life harmony and offer our employees a range of accommodations to help them achieve success both at work and in their personal lives.
* A global community dedicated to volunteerism and sustainability, where collaboration is always encouraged, and individuality drives solutions.
* Career progression planning with dedicated time each month for learning and development.
* Business Resource Groups open to all employees that serve as a catalyst for connection, growth, and belonging.



 Learn more about our benefits here.
 



 Salary is just one component of our compensation package and is based on several factors including but not limited to education, work experience, and certifications
